original_title: Princess Royal to Embark on First Royal Tour of 2024 in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Her Royal Highness The Princess Royal, Princess Anne, and Vice Admiral Sir Tim Laurence will undertake the first official royal tour of the year, visiting Sri Lanka from January 10-13, 2024.
This significant trip coincides with the 75th anniversary of bilateral relations between the United Kingdom and Sri Lanka.
Princess Anne's itinerary is expected to feature engagements celebrating the anniversary.
This year's royal travel schedule promises to be diverse and eventful, with other senior members of the Royal Family poised for global engagements.

News reports suggest that His Majesty The King and Her Majesty The Queen will embark on a tour of Canada in May, followed by a visit to Australia, New Zealand, and Samoa in October. Meanwhile, The Prince and Princess of Wales are rumored to be planning an official visit to Italy this spring.
Cabinet Nod For Science & Tech University with US Partnership
